reqs:
Pre-reqs: MECH 551.
This course is only open to students in the MEng Mechatronics Design program. Registration is by coordinator approval only. Students taking this course must have a B.A.Sc in Mechatronics or equivalent. Please contact the MECH Graduate Secretary for more information.

description: The full assembly, instrumentation, computer and electronic interfacing, and testing of a dynamic machine.
